text: Robert Awtry Locker (March 15, 1938 â€“ August 15, 2022) was an American Major League Baseball right-handed pitcher. He pitched from 1965 to 1975 for five different teams. He played for Chicago White Sox, Milwaukee Brewers, Oakland Athletics and the Chicago Cubs. Locker died in Bozeman, Montana, on August 15, 2022. He was 84.Robert Awtry Locker ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Milwaukee Brewers players Category:Oakland Athletics players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Sportspeople from Iowa
title: Bob Locker
